item.title: Getting started with retrofit2
item.description: Setup # What is retrofit? The official Retrofit page describes itself as: A type-safe REST client for Android and Java. This library makes downloading JSON or XML data from a web API fairly straightforward. Once the data is downloaded then it is parsed into a Plain Old Java Object (POJO) defined for each request using anyone of the adapter/parser listed here. For Demo purpose we would be using GSON parser
